title: Meghan Markle's Ex-Husband, Trevor Engelson, is Engaged
content: Exclusive Photo       Meghan Markle ‘s ex-husband is engaged — not to a member of the Royal Family or anything … but he still looks pretty damn happy about it.    TV and film producer Trevor Engelson recently revealed on social media he’s getting remarried, as well … to his health expert gf Tracey Kurland . A friend of Trevor’s posted this photo of the newly engaged couple.    Engelson — an executive producer on FX’s “Snowfall” — married Markle in 2011 after several years of dating … but they divorced just 2 years later. The reason for their split was reportedly due to Meghan’s busy schedule with “Suits” and long distance between them.    Like the now Duchess of Sussex … this will be Trevor’s second marriage.    We’re guessing his wedding won’t be quite as big of a spectacle as hers, though.
